snippet: Juan Martín del Potro battled his way past Richard Gasquet to win his opening round-robin match at the ATP Finals in London.
abstract: Juan Martin del Potro battles his way past Richard Gasquet to win his opening round-robin match at the ATP Finals in London.
lead_paragraph: Juan Martín del Potro battled his way past Richard Gasquet to win his opening round-robin match at the ATP Finals in London.

headline.main: Del Potro Tops Gasquet at the ATP Finals
